      • ArtemisBroker

        public ArtemisBroker(@NotNull @Size(min=1)
                     String brokerName,
                     @NotNull @Size(min=1)
                     String configurationDirectory)
        Creates a new ArtemisBroker instance using the supplied brokerName and configurationDirectory instance.
        Parameters:
        brokerName - The brokerName to assign the the embedded HornetQServer instance.
        configurationDirectory - The path to the directory where the default hornetq configuration files (named as per above) reside.
